name: ResolutionTracker
0:
”Alexa, ask resolution tracker, to add two days to my logs”
”Alexa, ask resolution tracker, to tweet”
”Alexa, ask resolution tracker, to reset”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: resolution tracker
des:
Let Alexa help you track your progress on your new year resolutions!

Link your Twitter account with this skill.

Then, simply ask Alexa to add the number of days spent following up on those new year goals to your logs and ask her to tweet your progress!

Let Alexa handle the mundane aspects of tracking your progress while you focus on your goals!
